Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mavericks scored 30 points in the first quarter, led by Luka Doncic's 14 in the frame, their most points in an opening quarter so far this season.
Others: The Mavericks dominated the Orlando Magic on Sunday night 108-85, getting this back-to-back off to a good start.
Despite leading by nearly 30, Dallas' offense wasn't crisp either, shooting just 10/32 (31.3%) from three and turning it over 18 times.
It's Crazy What Happens When Luka Doncic Starts Fast
